skins.shipDescription: Hiyou-class aircraft carrier number two ¨C Junyou.
skins.selfIntroduction: It's me, Junyou, your oldest friend! After those nasty girls tormented me so much, after all the fighting in the Aleutians, Santa Cruz, the Marianas, I finally got to see you again! I really don't know how you could have forgotten me... but please, hurry up and remember! Eheheh...
skins.acquisition: Oh, Commander, it's gotten so late. You've kept poor Junyou waiting. Let's go home together, ?like always?.
skins.login: Commander, I will ?always? be with you.
skins.details: Don't you think... we're bound to be together, Commander? Ahaha.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I wonder how I can make you remember, Commander...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Ryuujou... Where have I heard that name before...?
skins.secretaryIdle3: It's not funny anymore! You have to remember, Commander! We've been together ?since the very beginning?!
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander? We've known each other for so long, you can be a little more forward...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I know exactly what you're thinking, Commander.
